title: Fun Moments at the Bafta Film Awards
summary: The Bafta Film Awards are a big event for movies in Britain. This year, there were many exciting moments. Robert Aramayo won the best actor award, which was a surprise because many people thought Timothée Chalamet would win. Chalamet's movie did not win any awards even though it had many nominations. The Prince and Princess of Wales also came to the awards. Prince William is the president of Bafta and gave a speech. He talked about movies he likes, such as the F1 movie with great music. The event had famous stars, fun surprises, and even Paddington Bear. It was a night full of drama and happiness for everyone who loves films.

background_read: The Bafta Film Awards are an annual event in Britain that celebrates the best movies and actors. It is like the Oscars but for British films. Many famous people attend, and it is a big night with awards, speeches, and surprises. This year, there was a surprising win and royal guests, making it an exciting event for movie fans.
